thing-type.label: WCD2 Double Paddle Wall Controller
thing-type.description: Double Paddle Wall Controller<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtThe Z-Wave.Me Wall Controller is a Z-Wave device that can both control other Z-Wave devices and activate predefined scenes in an IP gateway. Although it is controlling other devices, the Wall Controller cannot act as Z-Wave network controller (primary or secondary) and will always need a Z-Wave network controller to be included into a Z-Wave network. The device can be used in different modes that are selected by configuration parameters:</p&gt <ol&gt<li&gtControl of groups of other Z-Wave devices using 'ON', 'OFF' and Dim commands.</li&gt <li&gtControl of devices in proximity of the Wall Controller using 'ALL ON' or 'ALL OFF' commands.</li&gt <li&gtActivation of predefined scenes in Gateways or other Z-Wave devices.</li&gt </ol&gt<br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtButton 3 confirms standard inclusion or exclusion started by a primary controller</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtButton 3 confirms standard inclusion or exclusion started by a primary controller</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtWakeup Information</h2&gt<p&gtbutton 2 issues a Node Information Frame or wakeup notification</p&gt

parameter.name: config_1_1
parameter.label: 1: Button 1 and 3 pair mode
parameter.description: Button 1 and 3 pair mode<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<ul&gt<li&gtIn separate mode button 1 works with group 1, button 3 with groups 3. Click is On, Hold is dimming Up, Double click is Off, Click-Hold is dimming Down. </li&gt <li&gtIn pair button 1/3 are Up/Down correspondingly. Click is On/Off, Hold is dimming Up/Down. Single clicks works with group 1, double click with group 3.</li&gt </ul&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_2_1
parameter.label: 2: Button 2 and 4 pair mode
parameter.description: Button 2 and 4 pair mode<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<ul&gt<li&gtIn separate mode button 2 works with group 2, button 4 with groups 4. Click is On, Hold is dimming Up, Double click is Off, Click-Hold is dimming Down. </li&gt <li&gtIn pair button 2/4 are Up/Down correspondingly. Click is On/Off, Hold is dimming Up/Down. Single clicks works with group 2, double click with group 4.</li&gt </ul&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_11_1
parameter.label: 11: Action on group 1
parameter.description: Action on group 1<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<ul&gt<li&gtIn Switch On/Off only mode On command is sent on Dim Up, Off on Dim Down. </li&gt <li&gtIn Scenes mode the scene ID sent is (10 * group + ActionID), where ActionID is: <ul&gt<li&gt1 = On,</li&gt <li&gt 2 = Off, </li&gt <li&gt3 = Dim Up Start, </li&gt <li&gt4 = Dim Down Start,</li&gt <li&gt 5 = Dim Up Stop, </li&gt <li&gt6 = Dim Down Stop</li&gt </ul&gt</li&gt </ul&gt</p&gt
